dataset.name: ds1
dataset.sql: select t.*,k.image_url from IP_INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY t,IP_IMAGE_UPLOAD k where t.image=k.id and t.if_del='0' and t.state='3' order by t.create_time

dataset.name: ds2
dataset.sql: select t.*,k.image_url from IP_ADVERTISEMENT t,IP_IMAGE_UPLOAD k where t.image_id=k.id and t.if_del='0' order by t.create_time
